name: Morning Glow Routine
steps: Gently massage your temples in circular motions
Use fingertips to tap around your eye area
Smooth your forehead with upward strokes
Massage your cheeks with gentle circular motions
Finish with neck stretches and deep breathing

name: Anti-Aging Face Lift
steps: Place palms on forehead and gently lift upward
Use knuckles to massage along jawline
Apply pressure to cheekbones and lift
Gently pull skin around eyes outward
Massage from chin to ears with firm pressure
Finish with lymphatic drainage techniques

name: Stress Relief Facial
steps: Take three deep breaths and relax your face
Gently massage your scalp with fingertips
Use palms to cover eyes and breathe deeply
Massage temples with slow circular motions
Apply gentle pressure to jaw muscles
End with facial cupping movements

name: Jawline Sculpting
steps: Clench and release jaw muscles 10 times
Move jaw side to side slowly
Make exaggerated chewing motions
Use thumbs to massage along jawline
Apply resistance with hands while opening mouth

name: Eye Brightening Routine
steps: Gently tap around eyes with ring fingers
Make circles around eye sockets
Press and hold pressure points at temples
Blink rapidly 20 times
Gently stretch eyelids upward

name: Lymphatic Drainage
steps: Start with gentle neck massage downward
Use lymphatic drainage strokes on face
Apply pressure to lymph nodes
Make sweeping motions from center outward
Focus on under-eye area with gentle taps
End with full face drainage sequence

name: Cheek Lift & Tone
steps: Smile wide and hold for 10 seconds
Puff out cheeks and hold air
Use palms to lift cheeks upward
Make fish face and hold position
Massage cheeks in upward circular motions
